About Me

Few things...

name is Roman Bogoudinov. I am a graduating student of SAMIedu professional college in Savonlinna.(Software development). Currently I seek for job as a Web developer. I moved to Finland in 2020 to start my studies here. I have a tech education from before, so I decided to make my dream come true and become a software developer.

The past 3 years I’ve done the “hardware” part of studies and passed the exam (Teknisessä tukipalvelussa toimiminen, IT-technician in English), at the same time I got familiar with

  • JS (basics of React, which I study now)
  • Node.js, HTML+CSS(SASS)
  • Fundamentals SQL,MongoDB
  • Basics of C++

    • Gained skills in back-end/front-end and continue studies on my own.

    I also do external courses, such as:

  • LUT – Software development skills: Full-stack
  • LUT - Web applications, Front-end skills, Mobile applications.
  • LUT - Software and system architectures
  • Helsinki university - Full stack web development (JS,React)
  • TAU - Programming: Structures (C++, GUI projects, Qt)

    • I am Native Russian. Was born in Leningrad (now Saint-Petersburg). For now, I based in Savonlinna, but I am ready to move all over Finland. I speak Finnish, English and obviously Russian.
